titles.title: To amend the Bankruptcy Act to make small business investment companies and specialized small business investment companies ineligible to file bankruptcy, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E558-559)
Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic and Commercial Law.

bill.summary: 3/24/1994--Introduced. Amends Federal bankruptcy law to declare that a small business investment company licensed by the Small Business Administration is ineligible to file for bankruptcy under Chapter 7.
